source:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
A rather skittish Mord is at his wit's end and might be glad of a helping hand.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
モルド・スークの慌てた様子のモルド族は、冒険者に若者を助けてほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_TODO_00<tab>Defeat the wild beasts at Samiel's Backbone.
target: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_TODO_00<tab>シムーンの背骨で魔物を討伐
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_TODO_02<tab>慌てた様子のモルド族に報告

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_000<tab>You there! Kind traveler, strong traveler! The younglings are in danger!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_000<tab>た、た、た、大変ネ！
若者たちが魔物に襲われてるヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_001<tab>Big, scary creatures! They looked hungry, too!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_001<tab>とっても強そうな魔物だから、
助けを呼びに来たヨ！
旅人さん、助けてほしいネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_002<tab>Please, you must hurry to Samiel's Backbone, east from here! Quickly, there is no time!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_002<tab>襲われてる場所、モルド・スークの東、
「シムーンの背骨」辺りネ！
魔物を倒して、若者たちを助けてヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_010<tab>You do not know Samiel's Backbone!? Just go east, then!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_010<tab>襲われてる場所、モルド・スークの東、
「シムーンの背骨」辺りネ！
魔物を倒して、若者たちを助けてヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFRIGHTENED03365_000_020<tab>Do not eat me! Mord fur very hard to swallow, I hear! Tickle your belly, it will!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFRIGHTENED03365_000_020<tab>ひぇぇぇぇっ！？
ボクを食べても美味しくないネ！
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFEAR03365_000_021<tab>シムーン様、ごめんなさいネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFRIGHTENED03365_000_030<tab>We are...not dead? Oh, you saved us, that is why! A thousand thousand thank-yous!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFRIGHTENED03365_000_030<tab>た、助かったネ？
ありがとネ、旅人さん！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFEAR03365_000_040<tab>I never thought I would be so happy to not be dead! Many thanks, stranger!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFEAR03365_000_040<tab>こ、怖かったネ……。
助けてくれて、ありがとネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFRIGHTENED03365_000_050<tab>I have never been eaten alive before, but I do not imagine it is very pleasant.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFRIGHTENED03365_000_050<tab>いま生きてるのは旅人さんのおかげネ。
本当に、ありがとネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFEAR03365_000_051<tab>If you had not rescued us, we would be in the belly of a beast, and probably not in one piece, either.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFEAR03365_000_051<tab>旅人さんが助けてくれなかったら、
いまごろ僕たち、魔物のお腹の中ヨ。
助けてくれて、ありがとネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_060<tab>You did it! These two have a lot to answer for, though.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_060<tab>とっても強い旅人さん、
若者たちを助けてくれて、ありがとネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_061<tab>You see, those bones once belonged to a mighty samiel, whose ghost still roams the plains! A lot of silly younglings go there to prove their bravery. But there are things much more dangerous than wandering spirits, oh yes!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_061<tab>あの大きな骨、伝説の巨大生物「シムーン」の骨、言われてるネ。
それで、シムーンの亡霊、出るって噂あるヨ……。
あそこで度胸試し、モルド族の若者なら一度はするネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFRIGHTENED03365_000_062<tab>I <var 1A 02 /var>wish<var 1A 01 /var> it was a ghost we had met instead of those horrible brutes! We will not be going back there any time soon!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFRIGHTENED03365_000_062<tab>みんな、強がり言って騒いで、
それで魔物の注意、引いちゃったみたいネ……。
とてとて反省ヨ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFEAR03365_000_063<tab>Speak for yourself! I was hoping to meet the great samiel, so I want to try it again. And I will not have the others calling me a coward for running away!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDFEAR03365_000_063<tab>旅人さん、助けてもらったから、やり直しネ。
また改めて、度胸試しするヨ……。
このまま根性なし、言われたくないからネ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_064<tab>To tell the truth, I did exactly the same thing when I was their age. It is something of a tradition!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_064<tab>私も昔、シムーンの背骨で度胸試ししたネ。
モルド族の若者、それで荒野での生き方、
覚えていくネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_065<tab>This is one of the ways we learn to fear and respect the desert, but also how we find the courage to face its many dangers. Though on this occasion, I think we would be two younglings short of a village were it not for you! Mord Souq thanks you, traveler!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA023_03365_MORDPANIC03365_000_065<tab>今回のこと、アイツらにとっていい経験ネ。
これで魔物の恐ろしさ、騒ぐの危険なこと、身にしみたはずヨ。
旅人さん、本当にありがとネ！
